attributes.action: Secure our borders FULLY against illegal immigrants and exile those found in the country IMMEDIATELY without the right to an appeal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The fact is, the PM has absolutely no idea of how many immigrants are living in this country and that definitely needs to change as I for one think he would be VERY surprised at the numbers because it feels to me that this country is becoming less and less British each month and becoming more and more eastern-European.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
